directions: Pour beer into a pint glass. Pour Irish cream and Irish whiskey into a shot glass. Gently drop the shot glass into the glass of beer.
ingredients: 8 fluid ounces stout beer (such as Guinness®)
1 fluid ounce Irish cream liqueur (such as Bailey's®)
1/2 fluid ounce Irish whiskey (such as Jameson®)
title: Irish Car Bomb Cocktail
